title: Mangoes & MonkeyBread: Fruity Fun with Ella & Louis
description: Ella & Louis have just arrived in The Gambia for their winter holidays. Settling at home, Louis is already missing sweet strawberries from Stockholm. Join Ella as she takes her brother on a yummy fruit tasting tour and discover fruits native to West Africa that you might have never seen before!  Along the way, see if you can find Happy, their adorable little dog who loves a game of hide and seek!  A light-hearted journey of discovery with beautiful illustrations and photographs. This charming book shares some of the beauty found in the smallest country in Africa.
author: Emily Joof
